name: bugsink
description: Bugsink is a self-hosted error monitoring and reporting tool for receiving error logs from applications and visualizing them in a clean UI. Ideal for dev teams who want to keep everything in-house.
features: Error Monitoring: Receive and track application errors in real-time. Catch bugs fast.
Clean Visualization: View error logs through intuitive web interface. Easy debugging.
Error Grouping: Automatically group similar errors together. Reduce noise.
Stack Traces: Detailed stack traces for quick debugging. Find root causes.
Team Collaboration: Share error reports with development team. Work together.
Self-Hosted: Keep error data on your own infrastructure. Complete privacy.
In-House Solution: Perfect for teams wanting data control. No third-party access.
